casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cleveland Sylvester HARRIS. No. 241P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of February 2005 by Defendant for resentence under the one eight law of the fair sentencing act:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
